configs.name: Steam Chat
configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[],"customLinkFilterRegex":"(.*)steam-chat-app(.*)","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"requestHeader":[{"requestHeader":"User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"APKLinkHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"(.*)steam-chat-app-(.*).apk","matchGroupToUse":"$2","versionDetection":true,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":false,"appName":"","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"","refreshBeforeDownload":false,"releaseDateAsVersion":false}

description.en: A lightweight app focused on chatting with friends and groups.
